summary: An FBI FD-1023 form documenting a confidential human source (CHS) report from November 23, 2021, regarding Boris Nikolic. The report notes Nikolic's interest in investing in a US AI company seeking DARPA funding and identifies him as a designated executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Boris Nikolic
persons.role: Subject of FBI report, designated executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate
persons.context: Managing Director of 'bng0' and Biomatics Capital, interested in investing in a US AI company seeking DARPA funding. Identified as a designated executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

persons.name: Merrin Morse
persons.context: Listed as present during the contact with the confidential human source (CHS).

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned as the deceased individual whose estate Boris Nikolic was designated to execute.

connections.description: Nikolic was designated as an executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate, indicating a formal financial/legal fiduciary role connected to Epstein after his death.

events.title: FBI Source Report on Boris Nikolic
events.description: An FBI confidential human source (CHS) provides information on Boris Nikolic's business interests and his role as an executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.

keyFacts: Boris Nikolic was designated as an executor of Jeffrey Epstein's estate.
Nikolic, through his roles at 'bng0' and Biomatics Capital, was interested in investing in a US-based Artificial Intelligence company.
The US AI company of interest was seeking funding from DARPA and other US Government sources.
The information was reported by an FBI confidential human source (CHS) to Special Agent Merrin Morse in San Francisco.
